item.title: Walrus Lillian
item.description: The Lillian is an analog, multi-stage phaser that from it’s sister pedal, the Julia where you can blend between Dry, Phase Shifted, and Vibrato. It has switch to select between 4 stages which is warm and tightened to 6 stages which is more lush and thicker. It’s name pays homage to Lillian Yonally who was apart of W.A.S.P (Women Air Force Service Pilots) during WWII. Knobs The Rate knob controls the Low Frequency Oscillator (LFO) speed from a steady pace to crazy past speeds.
